title: The Munificent Nature of Sri Chaitanya Mahaprabhu | ISKCON Bangalore
speaker: HG Jai Chaitanya Dasa

segments.key_quote: Actually, Mahaprabhu bestows His mercy upon the devotees in three ways.
segments.summary: This segment describes the three ways in which Chaitanya Mahaprabhu bestows His mercy: destruction of material miseries, reconciliation of scriptural contradictions, and inspiration for devotional service.
